traits.locale_text: [Draft] Units receive +1 stack of Bloodstained effect when affected by Raining Blood repedeadly, or when starting round in the pool of blood.
A creature with the bloodblessed or bloodstained effect gains +1 stack of this effect whenever Raining Blood is inflicted on it once again or whenever it starts its turn on a cell covered in blood.

languages.text: {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}または{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血塗れ{/g}効果を持つ生物は、{g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}血の雨{/g}が再び与えられるたび、または自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を血に覆われたセルで開始するたび、この効果を+1スタック得る。
